name: lando-mutagen
description: Automatically start and stop mutagen when starting and stopping a Lando project.

scripts.package: yarn clean && yarn compile && cp CHANGELOG.md dist && cp package.json dist && cp yarn.lock dist && cd dist && yarn install --production --immutable --immutable-cache --check-cache
scripts.install:home: yarn compile && rm -rf ~/.lando/plugins/lando_mutagen && mkdir -p ~/.lando/plugins && cp -r dist ~/.lando/plugins/lando_mutagen

author: Francois van der Ven (francois@vanderven.dev)
